features: Gentle formula with zinc oxide provides sun protection and 8 hours of hydration for sensitive skin
Daily facial moisturizing lotion helps prevent premature skin damage with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 UVA/UVB Sunscreen
Conditions skin surface with vitamin E and aloe to maintain healthy-looking skin. Active Ingredients: Octinoxate 6.0%, Zinc Oxide 3.0%
Formulated with patented SolaSheer Technology, Olay Complete is America's #1 UV Sunscreen Face Moisturizer
Fragrance-free, non-greasy, dermatologically tested and non-comedogenic (won't clog pores) formula for sensitive skin types
body.description: Protect against the #1 cause of aging skin—damage from the sun. Olay Complete All Day SPF 15 Facial Moisturizer with UVA/UVB protection for sensitive skin provides 8 hours of hydration. This gentle, lightweight lotion is fragrance free and features zinc oxide. It also includes vitamin E and aloe to help maintain healthy-looking skin. Unlike many facial moisturizers with sunscreen, Complete All Day facial moisturizer with SPF is non-greasy and lightweight. Its oil-free formula leaves skin with a healthy glow. With its patented SolaSheer Technology, experience hydration with sun protection from America’s #1 UV moisturizer.

productInformation.value: Fragrance-free lotion helps prevent skin damage by protecting against the sun's harmful rays with broad spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen Gentle formula provides 12 hours of long-lasting hydration for sensitive skin 100% oil-free, fragrance-free and PABA-free formula Conditions your skins surface with vitamin E and Aloe Feels lightweight and absorbs quickly into skin See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Olay Complete Lotion All Day Moisturizer with SPF 15 for Sensitive Skin - Fragrance-free moisturizer helps prevent premature skin damage with SolaSheer Technology - Gentle formula provides 8 hours of long-lasting hydration for sensitive skin - Non-greasy, dermatologically tested and non-comedogenic

Product Description Olay Complete All Day SPF 15 Facial Moisturizer with UVA/UVB protection for sensitive skin provides 8 hours of hydration. This gentle, lightweight lotion is fragrance free and features zinc oxide. It also includes vitamin E and aloe to help maintain healthy-looking skin. Unlike many facial moisturizers with sunscreen, Complete All Day facial moisturizer with SPF is non-greasy and lightweight. Its oil-free formula leaves skin with a healthy glow.

How To Use - Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure - Reapply at least every 2 hours - Use water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including limit time in sun, especially from 10 a.m. – 2 p.m. wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses. Children under 6 months: ask a doctor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this Olay face lotion for 30 years now, and have no desire to change. I love that it’s SPF 15 and made for sensitive skin. It’s not oily or greasy, and leaves my skin soft. Good job, Olay!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this moisturizer everyday. Very nice light moisturizer for day time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have been using this moisturizer for decades
reviews.reviewText: I really Ike Oil of Olay, It is a highly regarded lotion and offers some sun protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using this lotion for years
reviews.reviewText: I like this product, and the price was ok. Other places I normally purchase from were out of the variety for sensitive skin so I purchased here. The only issue was that the boxes had obviously had stickers removed (but not entirely) and it looked very tacky. The seller must have purchased them somewhere else (I'm guessing a discount store) and then sold them here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You can put it on a man’s bald head and it keeps the head from drying out and scaling.
reviews.reviewText: Olay is good for male or female skin.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item, great price
reviews.reviewText: An excellent product for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All you need
reviews.reviewText: I've used this moisturizer for years. The price was great for me and while moisturizer, overall, has increased a lot, this is still a nice price. Contains SPF, so can wear it alone.
